file_content.text: I checked into all of Ivory's bolt-holes--the one on Tatooine seems to be the one still active.
Rogun always shows up to spoil my good time. Let's give him a taste.
Then I'm going to Tatooine.
Here here. I bet I could get a good bid price to see the look on his face.
You always know what will make me happy.
[Flirt] Thanks.
If I could, I'd give you his head in silver tinsel.
But I think you'll enjoy that fruit more if you pluck it yourself.
What else do you know?
You've put Rogun about out of commission.
All he's got left is a handful of loyal killers, and he wants them to take you down in a blaze of glory. Don't let him.
Let me tie up some loose ends, and I'll head over when I can.
I've got some things to do.
Don't wait long, Captain.
This is your chance to wipe the slate and call the biggest criminal empire in the galaxy your own.
Captain... I just received an interesting offer from one of Rogun's former men. Seems he's got some exotic cavalry that needs a home.
Your doing, I trust?
Rogun's pipeline was through Gormak Zak, and Zak works for me now.
Rogun's business is ours.
You've got the magic, Captain. Won't be another crook in the galaxy who can touch you.
I hear you had some trouble on Voss, hmm, Captain?
Senator Dodonna asked me to call. She's busy defending her decision to send such an undiplomatic ambassador to Voss at a crucial time.
Any success learning Rogun's business?
Rogun's pipeline to Voss is gone for good.
I shut him down.
I'm sure the Senator will sleep easier knowing she won't wake up to a cyborg nexu on the pillow.
You've got Rogun in full retreat. He's calling his surviving lieutenants for a war council.
The Voss are convinced there was a Sith behind the smuggling; they should shut down the ring and maybe toss out the Empire.
I got Rogun and the Empire.
Well, look at you going beyond the call of duty. Never figured you for an overachiever.
It sounds like Rogun's hurting, though. He just called a war council for all his surviving lieutenants.
You want to congratulate me, I can think of better ways than a comlink.
[Flirt] Let's celebrate.
Then you're not having the right conversations, my dear.
Uh-oh, the line's getting staticky. I think we're about to lose you!
Ah, I didn't realize you're not alone.
Our time is short anyway; we just got word that Rogun is gathering his surviving lieutenants for some kind of war council.
When do we get to smash Rogun's face in?
That scum set me up again.
It's done. What now?
Your timing couldn't be better.
We just received word that Rogun is calling a war council for all his surviving lieutenants.
